title: Personalized Shop - Honoring your first set here!
body:
Hey guys,

[](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/article_page_v02.jpg?itok=IJEVf-Fr)
We know quite a few players lost their first set of personalized shop items after the reset.  It would be unfair to miss out an awesome deal, so we are honoring content from your first set.  

Up to this point we've been asking you to submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), which is solid and our team is working to get those to you.  We also want to open up the boards as another venue to help out.  Just **make sure you have enough RP on your account** so we can unlock them for you!

We are able to review your first set at their discount, so reply to this post with the following:

* Items in the first set that you like to unlock
* Confirm that you're okay with us removing the RP from you account.

Some players did not receive a first set of personalized items.  It's likely that the account wasn't logged in at the time, so no items were loaded for it. We're unable to recreate a set, but everyone should have access to the personalized shop now.  

If you've already put in a ticket, please hang tight for a response!  We'll reply back as soon as we can!

{{sticker:sg-kiko}} 

_Note: Broporo and I currently have access to assist with NA and OCE currently.  If you're on EU, your best bet is to submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for now!_

replies.body:
Hello Porobros,

May I get a full list of my previous offers as well?
I only remember that Rocket Girl Trist was there again and I _think_ Rakan's skin and a Sivir or Galio skin were on the far right?
Sorry I'm forgetful but thank you for assisting people on here =)

Sure thing LostFr0st,

• Galactic Nasus - 50% - Discount Price: 260 RP				
• Hextech Galio - 50% - Discount Price: 260 RP				
• Rocket Girl Tristana - 20% - Discount Price: 780 RP				
• Bad Santa Veigar - 40% - Discount Price: 585 RP				
• Ghost Bride Morgana - 40% - Discount Price: 585 RP				
• Snowstorm Sivir - 50% - Discount Price: 487 RP

Aha, knew she was there too <3

May I have Snowstorm Sivir added to my account please.
I am ok with you removing the 487 RP.

Thanks a bunch Porocles^^

You got it, bud!  All set!
{{sticker:katarina-love}}

Hello Porocles,

May I get a full list of my previous offers?
Hey!  I looked into this for you, but it doesn't look like a first set was loaded for this account.  Sorry!
Ah ok thank you

Hello Porocles,

May I get a full list of the previous offers?
I have forgotten some of them.

I do remember that I had Star Guardian Lux 50% off, and I consent to you removing 675 RP from my account in order to unlock her.
Thank you in advance for making for allowing me to become the magical girl I was always meant to be.

Hey there, sure thing!

• Archduke Nasus - 30% - Discount Price: 525 RP				
• Star Guardian Lux - 50% - Discount Price: 675 RP				
• Mafia Graves - 60% - Discount Price: 390 RP				
• Captain Gangplank - 60% - Discount Price: 390 RP				
• Butcher Urgot - 60% - Discount Price: 208 RP				
• Jurassic Cho'Gath - 40% - Discount Price: 585 RP				

I've removed 675 RP from your account and added the star guardian for you!

{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

I'd like to have Mafia Graves and Butcher Urgot as well, if that's alright.
I consent to you removing 390 and 208 RP from my account, respectively.

Thank you so much! <3
You got it!  The RP has been removed, and skins unlocked!  :D

Could I get the full list of my previous offers? In particular I think I had Cosmic Dust Xayah and High Noon Jhin in there but I don't remember what the discounts were on them or what the others were. Edit: I think Dryad Soraka and Fnatic Janna were in there too? lol i dunno

Sure thing!  Your first set contained the following:


• Heartseeker Ashe - 40% - Discount Price: 585 RP				
• Bad Santa Veigar - 50% - Discount Price: 487 RP				
• Sanguine Garen - 40% - Discount Price: 312 RP				
• Dryad Soraka - 50% - Discount Price: 260 RP				
• Fnatic Janna - 50% - Discount Price: 375 RP				
• Cosmic Dusk Xayah - 70% - Discount Price: 405 RP

Haha, I guess the High Noon Jhin was just wishful thinking. That Heartseeker Ashe is a better discount than I have in the current store, though, so could you please remove the 585 RP and add that one to my account? Thanks.
High past noon, I suppose.  :P  Sure thing, I've removed the RP and added her for you!
Can I ask for the list of my previous offers, please?
Hey there, unfortunately I wasn't able to find any results for this account.  In this case the store did not load items, sorry about that!
I would like the Proyect: zed discount that i had before, i had a 50 or 60% and now only 30% can i please have the previous discount ?
You'll need to put in a ticket to the EU agents, and they'll be able to get that taken care of shortly. Porocles and myself only have access to NA and OCE at the moment.
I Had Cosmic Dusk Xayah and im fine with you taking the RP For it
it was 60% off
Got her added for ya bud ^_^!
I had a Championship Zed deal, Im fine with you taking the RP out of my account
Unfortunately Porocles and myself only have access to correct accounts on NA and OCE ourselves. Our agents can still get you that skin, but you'll need to get that done in a ticket!
id like championship thresh challenger ahri and firecracker jinx and I'm fine with you taking rp out

Hey, I looked into this for you and was only able to verify Firecracker Jinx and Championship thresh.  The only Ahri item I saw was for Foxfire.  Let me know if you'd still like those 3 unlocked (1417 RP).

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=cgvNEnlg,comment-id=00090000,timestamp=2017-09-20T21:38:50.915+0000)
>
> Hey, I looked into this for you and was only able to verify Firecracker Jinx and Championship thresh.  The only Ahri item I saw was for Foxfire.  Let me know if you'd still like those 3 unlocked (1417 RP).

oh oops I mustve gotten confused but ill take those three plz . tyyy

Great!  I've added them both your account for 890 RP!
Thank ya kindly
I would like Mighty Jax and Championship Riven from my first item set, I'm okay with you using the RP on my account for the skin
Okay, Okayyyy!  I've removed 754 RP and added the skins.  Really nice skins here, that Championship Riven!
Thank you very much! What a great deal!
I would like winter wonderland ori and challenger ahri unlocked. I am also ok with you taking the required rp from my account.

That's 877 RP, and added to your account!  
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
Thank you so much!
I would like blood moon jhin from my first set unlocked. I am fine with you taking the rp for it from my account. (If it wasnt bloodmoon jhin im pretty sure it was highnoon but idk man)
Yup, it was for Blood Moon Jhin at 50% off!  I've removed 675 RP and unlocked the skin for you.  :D
I would like Cosmic dusk Xayah from my first set im also ok with you taking required rp for skin :)
I would like project fiora from my first set unlocked. I am also ok with you taking the required rp from my account.

{{sticker:fiora-cool}}
thx
I would like Luna Wraith Morgana from my first set unlocked. I am ok with you taking the required RP from my account. Thanks!

Hey Porocles, quick question.

Can I request the list of first offers? I vaguely remember it, but not in full details, and I'd like to think a bit more about it before making a decision.

Or is a Support Ticket still my best bet for this specific situation?
Hey!  We currently aren't able to check for EU so your best bet is to put in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to get those details!
Can I see what were my previous offers? :(
